Package pp2016.team19.client.comm

Comprises the communication classes for the client-side which are necessary to set up a proper communication between client and server.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HandlerClient
    Builds the connection for the Client and handles the receiving and the transmitting of messages.
    PingCheckClient
    Checking the connection between Client and Server via Ping-Messages The PingCheckClient Class builds the TimerTask for sending a Message within a certain interval to the Server.
    ReceiverClient
    Builds the Thread for receiving Message-objects from the Server.
    TransmitterClient
    Builds the Thread for transmitting Message-objects from the Client to the Server.

Package pp2016.team19.client.comm Description

Comprises the communication classes for the client-side which are necessary to set up a proper communication between client and server.
Author:
Goetz, Oliver, 5961343
